entry.title: Newsletter #113
entry.content:
Hi folks! Today is the 92nd anniversary of the Turkish Republic!

Together with our Turkish pal Armagan we wish Happy Republic Day, Turkey!

{% img center /images/posts/arma.jpg %}

Below you can find the usual list of interesting articles we discovered in the past 7 days.

  • a minimal x86 kernel using rust

  • analyze the quality of your php code

  • dockerui – a web interface for docker.

  • domain driven design for services architecture

  • es6 overview in 350 bullet points

  • fetching and serving billions of urls with aragog | pinterest engineering

  • new in symfony 2.8: propertyinfo component

  • nodejs — release proposal: v5.0.0

  • open-sourcing pinterest mysql management tools | pinterest engineering

  • overriding symfony // speaker deck

  • paving the way for symfony 3 with the “deprecation detector” tool

  • set up kubernetes with a docker compose one-liner – o'reilly radar

  • six cool features of the git 2.x series – atlassian developers

  • the art of debugging

  • the css modules

  • the future of symfony : symfony3

  • the stack that helped medium drive 2.6 millennia of reading time — medium engineering — medium

  • the stack that helped medium drive 2.6 millennia of reading time

  • the surprising danger of being good at your job | time

  • things to avoid when writing css — medium

  • visualizing docker containers and images

  • why contenteditable is terrible — medium engineering — medium

  • you might not need gulp.js — startups, wanderlust, and life hacking — medium
